
=========================
Changes to githubbuildout
=========================

2013-04-25 0.2:
---------------

- Declare a user agent to comply with GitHub's new API requirement (see
  http://developer.github.com/changes/2013-04-24-user-agent-required/):
  `githubbuildout/$version zc.buildout`


2012-06-21 0.1:
---------------

- Initial Release (based on lovely.buildouthttp)
